ActEmergency Management Act
SubjectNo. 123 (BC) Provincial Emergencies Financial Assistance Order
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCY FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER NÂ° 123 - which makes a declaration of federal concern and authorizes the federal government to provide financial assistance to the province of BRITISH COLUMBIA with respect to the exceptional number of wildfires between May 2 and November 2, 2009.
